external_references.description: Sherstobitoff, R., Malhotra, A. (2018, October 18). ‘Operation Oceansalt’ Attacks South Korea, U.S., and Canada With Source Code From Chinese Hacker Group. Retrieved November 30, 2018.
Sherstobitoff, R., Malhotra, A. (2018, October 18). ‘Operation Oceansalt’ Attacks South Korea, U.S., and Canada With Source Code From Chinese Hacker Group. Retrieved November 30, 2018.

objects.description: [OceanSalt](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0346) can create a reverse shell on the infected endpoint using cmd.exe.(Citation: McAfee Oceansalt Oct 2018) [OceanSalt](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0346) has been executed via malicious macros.(Citation: McAfee Oceansalt Oct 2018)
